MERGE INTO portlet USING DUAL ON ( dashboard_idx = #{dashboardIdx} AND portlet_idx = #{portletIdx} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
portletName = #{portletName}, portletId = #{portletId}, width = #{width}, height = #{height}, coordX = #{coordX}, coordY = #{coordY}, isDraggable = #{isDraggable}, isResizable = #{isResizable}, isStatic = #{isStatic}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (
portlet_idx,
dashboard_idx, portlet_name, portlet_id, width, height, padding, coord_x, coord_y, is_draggable, is_resizable, is_static ) VALUES (
'PORTLET' || LPAD(PORTLET_IDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 13, '0'),
#{dashboard_idx}, #{portlet_name}, #{portlet_id}, #{width}, #{height}, #{padding}, #{coord_x}, #{coord_y}, #{is_draggable}, #{is_resizable}, #{is_static} )
